text: Léonor Serraille (born in Lyon) is a French director and screenwriter. She won a César Award for Best First Feature Film, Caméra d'Or , and Lumières Award for Best First Film . == Filmgraphy == * Body, 2016 * Montparnasse Bienvenue (Jeune Femme) 2017 == References == Category:1985 births Category:French screenwriters Category:Living people Category:French movie directors Category:Actors from Lyon Category:Writers from Lyon Category:French television actors
title: Léonor Serraille
